text:
The best leaders THANK those who elevate their work. They understand that their success is a product of lots of individual contributions worthy acknowledgement & appreciation. 

Kudos @juliastmi! 

Just back from vacay and can’t wait to listen!

text: People, mostly kids, lining up outside City Hall to call for action on climate change.
author: brigidbergin

text: Next up ⁦@NYCSpeakerCoJo⁩ who also wants to ban the Williams Pipeline who says the city needs green, renewable energy investments.
author: brigidbergin

text: “And by the way,” @NYCComptroller says, “our pension funds are leading the world,” as he talks about his efforts to divest from fossil fuels. “We are never going to kowtow to the energy industry.”
author: brigidbergin

text: “We’re here today because we’re going to stop the Williams Pipeline,” ⁦@NYCComptroller⁩ says. It will cost $1 billion and tear up miles of the city’s coastline, he adds.

text: On Mayor ⁦@BilldeBlasio⁩ going to New Hampshire: “Good luck,” ⁦@NYCSpeakerCoJo⁩ starts. He goes on to say it’s clear the mayor is very seriously considering a run for president and notes it may get more complicated down the line given how much goes on here in NYC.
author: brigidbergin

text: .⁦@NYCSpeakerCoJo⁩ says he’s very proud of the ⁦@NYCCouncil⁩ for passing a package of lead legislation today. Emphasis here is on preventing children from being poisoned.
